attributes.action: Introduce more punishments to distruptive School Students and more PARENTING classes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a Teenager, I get tired of the continuing disruptive Students who are potentially jeopardizing MY future. I'm sure others feel this way???
So perhaps more PARENTING classes are in order as well as more punishments, after all, where do they learn some of their behavior from? Parents perhaps?
